doc.title: $exce$$
doc.plot: Debi Diamond climbs the corporate ladder the hard way - on her back. As junior execs at "Super Rubber" (a condom company), Diamond and Marc Wallice team up against T.T. Boy and Lilli Xene, who have been tape-recording their rival's plans from the executive washroom.

Debi Diamond climbs the corporate ladder the hard way - on her back. As junior execs at "Super Rubber" (a condom company), Diamond and Marc Wallice team up against T.T. Boy and Lilli Xene, who have been tape-recording their rival's plans from the executive washroom.
